About System Is Error

A collection of write-ups and research on real-world cyber security, which hopefully will grow in time. It is named after a comical error message returned from a bug bounty target, in the spirit of “all your base are belong to us”:

About oneinctrl

An Application Security & Software engineer, aspiring bug bounty researcher and ethical hacker.
